testcase.name: basicMethod

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected header "Server" was not "Apache/2.4.18 (Ubuntu)", was "Apache/2.4.52 (Ubuntu)". Headers are: Date=Mon, 12 May 2025 13:33:51 GMT Server=Apache/2.4.52 (Ubuntu) Access-Control-Allow-Origin=* Access-Control-Allow-Methods=POST Access-Control-Max-Age=3600 Access-Control-Allow-Headers=Content-Type, Access-Control-Allow-Headers, Authorization, X-Requested-With Content-Length=38 Keep-Alive=timeout=5, max=100 Connection=Keep-Alive Content-Type=application/json;charset=UTF-8
